## Untidy –\> Tidy data

### Dirty data

```{r}
#| echo: true
ncbi_data <- read_tsv(here("data/01_ncbi_data.tsv.gz"))  # Read and display the gzipped TSV file
print(head(ncbi_data, 10))  # Print the first 10 rows to display
```

### Clean data

